author: Ewan Palmer
title: Denver Updates Coronavirus 'Stay at Home' Order to Allow Liquor and Marijuana Stores to Stay Open After Long Queues
description: People rushed out to stock up on alcohol, causing huge lines, as Denver prepared for a lockdown amid the COVID-19 outbreak.
content:
The city of Denver, Colorado, has updated its recently enforced "stay at home" order to help combat the spread of coronavirus to allow its liquor and marijuana stores to remain open.
Denver Mayor Michael B. Hancock confirmed that the "explicit" stay at home … [+4934 chars]
